wikipedia_page.main: Alan Peter Slough (24 September 1947 – 22 March 2021) was an English professional footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League from the 1960s to 1980s, notably with Luton Town.

response: * Alan Slough - professional footballer, Luton Town FC, Fulham FC
